snippet.title: Man 'tries to abduct' girl, 9, at Seymour Shaw Park netball courts, Miranda
snippet.content:
Seymour Shaw Park netball courts. Picture: Sutherland Shire Council
Police are searching for a man after a reported attempted abduction of a girl, 9, at Seymour Shaw Park netball courts on Saturday.
Police said the girl was at the courts in Wandella Road, Miranda, with her family about 9am when she was reportedly approached by an unknown man.
Read more: â€‹
"The man picked her up and began to carry her away, but the girl yelled out and broke free," the spokesman said.
"The girl told her father about the incident and police were alerted. "The girl did not suffer any injuries." Miranda police conducted a patrol of the area, but were not able to locate the man.
Detectives continue to investigate the incident and would like to speak to a man who they believe could assist with investigations. He is described as being of Caucasian appearance, about 180cm tall, with a solid build and wearing a black jumper and blue jeans.
